message: If anyone is interested in doing a weekend design project, I have a convore iPad app ready to be launch, but needs some design touch... willing to pay (not a lot), but for a reasonable amount of money
Don't mind helping. I work for Wirebox.co.uk
I can't commit to this but if you want a second opinion on anything I can give you my e-mail address?
I'm UI at Zynga btw
you mean like a gradient?
yea

I just need something decent out right now, doesn't have to be super shiny.. as long as it's acceptable.. what worried me is the background color of the forms to create group, the popup window.. as of now it's just white
it needs more flavor :)

@spencer just thought that toolbar on top shouldn't be black.. having some options would be nice..  also the splash screen/login page is what worries me... it's very plain http://dl.dropbox.com/u/19680269/Photo%20May%2027%2C%203%2022%2019%20PM.png
I don't think it's ugly at all. Looks like it's built entirely from Apple SDK UI which is expected, but that's a good thing (because Apple did a great job with their defaults.

I guess a little tidying up of the icons (star and reply) would be good, and maybe rounding the corners on profile pics to soften it up a bit.. but overall I like the look of it. Also yes - maybe using a lighter palette at the top might help.
that kind of convention is so wired into peoples' heads it's probably best not to mess with it. Instagram styled their pieces a bit differently.. maybe fold it in on a v2 update?
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/19680269/Photo%20May%2027%2C%203%2032%2059%20PM.png
thanks a lot
unless you're in a rush to get a functioning and super pretty app out :-)

Some of the stuffs that needs designing:
1. Splash screen/logo
2. I need background color/pattern recommendation
3. Color suggestions
This is not nothing major or stuff
